application_details: Bayer claims PPC induces infringement of the 424 Patent through its product monograph
evidence_presented: no explicit instructions for infringement, reliance on speculation about future actions
decision_reasoning: dismissed as vexatious due to no reasonable chance of success in proving induced infringement
result_of_case: Court granted PPC's motion, dismissing parts of Bayer's application and ordering costs against Bayer
procedure_followed: PPC moved under s. 6(5)(b) to strike portions of Bayer's application, arguing lack of evidence for induced infringement
